name: SLID - Strength Lies In Difference
description:
You suddenly wake up in a really weird dungeon. A voice echoes in the dark halls of an eerie castle. 

"MWAHAHAHA!" laughs an evil sounding voice, "I have finally found a way to stop you wretched heroes from bringing ruin to my mischievous plans! You may be good at swinging swords, but I bet… you’re too dumb to be able to solve my EXTREMELY CLEVER mathematical conundrums! After all… you can’t be all brawns and have brains, too, right?"

Prepare to face mind-bending puzzles in SLID, an insane mixture of Sokoban and simple maths! Can you escape the dungeon?
